Summary Note:
Carmen Antonia Hernández and the RM met at a financial seminar in Madrid. They attended several workshops together and exchanged ideas on market trends, which sparked a long-term professional relationship.
Carmen Antonia Hernández is a 61 year old retired Logistics Conglomerate Owner from Spain.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Carmen Antonia Hernández is currently widowed. Her child is named Torres.
Education Background:
Carmen finished secondary school at Colegio San Ignacio de Loyola Valencia in 1983.
After that, she went on to study at IESE Business School until 1976.
Occupation History:
Carmen Antonia Hernández is a seasoned professional with over 38 years of experience.
Carmen Antonia Hernández's first role was as a Ship Broker at Elcano Shipping Company S.A., where she worked diligently from 1987 to 1992 to establish a strong reputation.
She then transitioned to Naviera Armas S.A. as a Shipping Company Owner, leveraging her expertise to drive results from 1992 to 1994.
In 1996, she joined Peñarroya Shipping S.A. as a Fleet Manager, taking on new challenges and responsibilities that helped her grow both personally and professionally.
In 1998, she transitioned to Transmediterránea S.A. to take on the position of Maritime Industry Leader, capitalizing on her expertise to propel business growth.
Until retiring, Carmen Antonia Hernández served as a Logistics Conglomerate Owner at Naviera Armas S.A., contributing significantly from 2005 to 2024.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 1550000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
Her remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Segovia, Cuenca and Almería, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome her as a new client.
